        public void createReservation(manageTable tbManager,
                              manageMember memberManager)
        Creates reservation based on user input which are name, date, time, contact, number of pax, member status.
        Parameters:
        tbManager - A manageTable object to perform management logic of tables.
        memberManager - A manageMember object to perform management logic of members.

      • readReservation

        public manageReservation readReservation()
                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Reads from "reservations.txt" text file and returns a manageReservation object.
        Returns:
        a manageReservation object that contains the array list of all existing reservations.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • removeExpired

        public void removeExpired()
        Removes reservations if current date-time is two hours more than the date-time of the reservation.
